channel.title: 317 skill xp
channel.description: how do i raise the xp rate of all skills in a 317 server?

item.title: 317 skill xp
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“jose3121, post:2, topic:326533”]dude wtf your posting like 10000 help questions when you can just post in one thread…and use the search button I’ve seen this posted before and resolved[/quote]If you’re not going to help then don’t post.

ThatCrackerZach, find your XP rate at the moment (try to hit a 1 on a monster and check how much XP you gained) and then search for

120*hitDiff

120 is my XP rate so change the 120 to the amount of XP you got when you hit a one on an NPC, search for that in the file ‘client.java’ and then change it to whatever XP you want it to give you.

I think there are multiple ones for attack, defence, strength, etc. so you might need to search for it and change it more than once.

Read full topic
